biotools.summary: Automated tool for computing pK values of ionizable groups in macromolecules and adding missing hydrogen atoms according to the specified pH of the environment. Given a (PDB) structure file on input, H++ outputs the completed structure in several common formats (PDB, PQR, AMBER inpcrd/prmtop) and provides a set of tools useful for analysis of electrostatic-related molecular properties.
